<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 457, 320, 471]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 472, 464, 486]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 487, 598, 501]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 502, 380, 515]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 532, 254, 545]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 546, 652, 560]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 561, 380, 574]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 575, 892, 604]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 635, 606, 649]]<|/det|>
